page.title: 19LOCAL HISTORY WYDDIAL
page.content: Wyddial_ Widihale in Domesday Book._ corner of land where withies grow or withy or willow nook or hall near the willows. Biggin_ Scandinavian word meaning building or house.The Biggin or Hospital of St.Mary stood on the site of Biggin Farm. Beauchamps_ Name of family who held the manor in 1303 and later. Cave Gate_Refers to the legend of an underground passage to Anstey Castle. Castle House_ on the west side of road halfway between Cave Gate and Silk Mead.Formerly the Castle Inn. Never a fortified site. Flint Cottages.Ironcally known locally as Flint Hall.Built from flints from Anstey Quarry.
